name: SHREYASH CHANDRA
college: Guru Tegh Bahadur Institute Of Technology - GGSIPU

education.school: Guru Tegh Bahadur Institute Of Technology - GGSIPU

projects.name: PayNow
projects.description: Built a full-stack virtual payment platform. Managed transaction sessions in MongoDB, ensuring data integrity and reliability. Enabled user-to-user payments. Implemented comprehensive user authentication, enhancing platform security using JWT.

projects.name: SpaceVerse
projects.description: Built an end-to-end gallery for storing and sharing space photos, using Next.js and TypeScript. Integrated authentication using Clerk Auth. Implemented image uploads with Uploadthing. Utilized PostgreSQL with Drizzle ORM for efficient data management.

projects.name: WeatherAPP
projects.description: Developed a weather application providing real-time weather updates using OpenWeather API. Ensured cross-browser compatibility and responsive design for optimal user experience. Implemented data fetching using the Fetch API.

experiences.description: Developed a React.js project from scratch, enhancing user experience and reducing load times by 20%. Implemented a new design system, improving code maintainability and consistency across the application. Refactored the codebase, resulting in a 30% increase in development efficiency.

Contributed to React.js projects, enhancing frontend functionality and user engagement. Optimized backend processes by writing efficient MySQL queries, improving data retrieval speed by 15%. Resolved critical bugs, increasing application stability and user satisfaction.

full_output.name: SHREYASH CHANDRA
achievements_and_awards: Built an AI tool called Padhlybh.ai which was designed to help students plan their study schedules effectively.
